Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.proxymodel

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardPanel
    BoardPanel is an extension of Java Swing's JPanel used to draw the game's board and prompts in the graphic client
    CliDrawer  
    ClientCell
    ClientCell represent the model's cell without the server's logic
    Coords
    This Coords represent the couple of integer coordinates that identifies a cell in the game's grid
    Display
    it is used to build the display where the size of the gui jframe is set, mouse listeners are created
    Drawer
    This is the abstract strategy of the client's drawers, that can concretely be CLI or GUI Drawer
    GodCards
    used to store name and description to be shown to the player
    GodsPanel
    draw the game screen for selecting the gods
    GuiDrawer
    this function sets the flags in order to understand in drawing mode what to draw when certain events are triggered it also sends the data, i.e. the name and number of players when the preset buttons are pressed
    GuiMapTest  
    GuiTest  
    LoginPanel
    create the game login screen where you log in and choose the number of players, with the background image and set the font and the color of the displayed text the buttons and the textbox are drawn in the guiDrawer
    MouseListenerChoice
    used to click on the choice that is offered when playing whether or not you want to use the power of the god you are using.
    MouseListenerGame
    it is used to play in the game, ie select the cells where you want to move, build and which worker to select.
    MouseListenerGodCards
    1.serve to let the partyOwner select the gods that all players can use in the game 2.Each player selects the god he wants to use in the game
    MyAction  
    Player
    This class represents the game's Player in the client, with its name, color, godCard and workers It is similar to the server's Player class, but without the model's logic
    ProxyModel
    it contains the current situation of the game which is inside the game server, removing the logic
    ProxyModelTest  
    StartGame  
    Turn
    manages turn, memorizing the prev, post and current player
    WorkerClient
    it contains all the worker information including the position, the owner and if it is selected, useful information for the cli, which colors differently according to the owner and does operations based on the position
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Phase
